item.title: Getting Started Fcitx with chinese input method in Linux
item.author: yanboyang713@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Boyang Yan
item.description: Introduction Fcitx is a lightweight input method framework aimed at providing environment independent language support for Linux. It supports a lot of different languages and also provides many useful non-CJK features. In this article, I will introduction: How to install Fcite in Manjaro/Arch Linux. How to Config Environmental variables Install fcite packages in Manjaro 1 yay -Syu adobe-source-han-sans-otc-fonts adobe-source-han-serif-otc-fonts 1 yay -Syu fcitx fcitx-googlepinyin fcitx-im fcitx-configtool Config Environmental variables 1 vim ~/.
